entry.title: Glow
entry.content: I met Dominic at LuckyMe sometime around 2010. We both connected over our mutual admiration for The Clipse and when he approached me to direct Lunice’s first music video I knew I wanted to incorporate his energy into the piece I took incense and a video-projector into my closet. I projected my iTunes visualizer against the incense smoke to create a glowing palette. With my DSLR I photographed the projector light striking the incense. In post, I composited Lunice dancing directly on top of my glowing images. I believe I used a hard-light filter in Final Cut so the smoke seamlessly blended into Lunice’s body.
